    Interface and Description
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.exceptions.IDimpleException
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.SDiscreteVariable
    Use GibbsDiscrete instead.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.sumproduct.SDiscreteVariable
    Use SumProductDiscrete instead.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.SFactorGraph
    Will be removed in future release. Use GibbsSolverGraph instead.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.lp.SFactorGraph
    Will be removed in future release. Use LPSolverGraph instead.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.minsum.SFactorGraph
    Will be removed in future release. Use MinSumSolverGraph instead.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.particleBP.SFactorGraph
    Will be removed in future release. Use ParticleBPSolverGraph instead.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.sumproduct.SFactorGraph
    Will be removed in future release. Use SumProductSolverGraph instead.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.SFactorGraph.Arguments
    set corresponding GibbsOptions using setOption on graph instead of using this class to configure Gibbs solver.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.sumproduct.SFiniteFieldFactor
    Use SumProductFiniteFieldFactor instead.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.sumproduct.SFiniteFieldVariable
    Use SumProductFiniteFieldVariable instead.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.SRealFactor
    Use GibbsRealFactor instead.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.particleBP.SRealFactor
    Use ParticleBPRealFactor instead.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.SRealJointVariable
    Use GibbsRealJoint instead.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.sumproduct.SRealJointVariable
    Use SumProductRealJoint instead.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.SRealVariable
    Use GibbsReal instead.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.particleBP.SRealVariable
    Use ParticleBPReal instead.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.sumproduct.SRealVariable
    Use SumProductReal instead.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.STableFactor
    Use GibbsTableFactor instead.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.lp.STableFactor
    Use LPTableFactor instead.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.minsum.STableFactor
    Use MinSumTableFactor instead.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.sumproduct.STableFactor
    Use SumProductTableFactor instead.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.lp.SVariable
    Use LPDiscrete instead.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.minsum.SVariable
    Use MinSumDiscrete instead.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.model.variables.VariableBase
    Use Variable instead. This will be removed in a future release.

    com.analog.lyric.dimple.factorfunctions.core.FactorTable.deserializeFromXML(String)
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.sumproduct.SumProductTableFactor.disableOptimizedUpdate()
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsDiscrete.disableSavingAllSamples()
    Instead set GibbsOptions.saveAllSamples to false using LocalOptionHolder.setOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>, T).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsReal.disableSavingAllSamples()
    Instead set GibbsOptions.saveAllSamples to false using LocalOptionHolder.setOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>, T).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsRealJoint.disableSavingAllSamples()
    Instead set GibbsOptions.saveAllSamples to false using LocalOptionHolder.setOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>, T).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsSolverGraph.disableSavingAllSamples()
    Instead set GibbsOptions.saveAllSamples to false using LocalOptionHolder.setOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>, T).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsSolverGraph.disableSavingAllScores()
    Instead set GibbsOptions.saveAllScores to false using LocalOptionHolder.setOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>, T).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsSolverGraph.disableTempering()
    Instead set GibbsOptions.enableAnnealing option to false using LocalOptionHolder.setOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>, T).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.particleBP.ParticleBPSolverGraph.disableTempering()
    Instead set ParticleBPOptions.enableAnnealing option to false using LocalOptionHolder.setOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>, T).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.sumproduct.SumProductTableFactor.enableOptimizedUpdate()
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsSolverGraph.enableTempering()
    Instead set GibbsOptions.enableAnnealing option to true using LocalOptionHolder.setOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>, T).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.particleBP.ParticleBPSolverGraph.enableTempering()
    Instead set ParticleBPOptions.enableAnnealing option to true using LocalOptionHolder.setOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>, T).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.model.variables.Variable.fixValue()
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsSolverGraph.getBurnInUpdates()
    This method will be removed in a future release.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.events.DimpleEventListener.getDefault()
    As of release 0.07 the default listener is no longer used and will be removed in a future release.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsDiscrete.getDefaultSamplerName()
    Will be removed in future release. Instead use GibbsOptions.discreteSampler option.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsReal.getDefaultSamplerName()
    Will be removed in future release. Instead use GibbsOptions.realSampler option.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsRealJoint.getDefaultSamplerName()
    Will be removed in future release. Instead use GibbsOptions.realSampler option.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsSolverGraph.getInitialTemperature()
    Instead get GibbsOptions.initialTemperature option using AbstractOptionHolder.getOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.particleBP.ParticleBPSolverGraph.getInitialTemperature()
    Instead get ParticleBPOptions.initialTemperature option using AbstractOptionHolder.getOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.core.proposalKernels.CircularNormalProposalKernel.getParameters()
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.core.proposalKernels.IProposalKernel.getParameters()
    Will be removed in future release. Instead use IOptionConfigurable.getOptionConfiguration(java.util.List<com.analog.lyric.options.Option<?>>).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.core.proposalKernels.NormalProposalKernel.getParameters()
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsReal.getProposalKernel()
    Will be removed in future release. Instead get kernel directly from sampler.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsRealJoint.getProposalKernel()
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsReal.getProposalStandardDeviation()
    Will be removed in future release. Instead lookup corresponding option for desired proposal kernel (e.g. NormalProposalKernel.standardDeviation.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsRealJoint.getProposalStandardDeviation()
    Will be removed in future release. Instead lookup corresponding option for desired proposal kernel (e.g. NormalProposalKernel.standardDeviation.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.particleBP.ParticleBPReal.getProposalStandardDeviation()
    instead lookup NormalProposalKernel.standardDeviation option using AbstractOptionHolder.getOptionOrDefault(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>) method.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.sumproduct.SumProductSolverGraph.getSampledFactorBurnInScansPerUpdate()
    Will be removed in a future release. Instead set GibbsOptions.burnInScans on this object using LocalOptionHolder.setOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>, T).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.sumproduct.SumProductSolverGraph.getSampledFactorSamplesPerUpdate()
    Will be removed in a future release. Instead get GibbsOptions.numSamples on from this object using AbstractOptionHolder.getOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.sumproduct.SumProductSolverGraph.getSampledFactorScansPerSample()
    Will be removed in a future release. Instead set GibbsOptions.scansPerSample on this object using LocalOptionHolder.setOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>, T).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.particleBP.ParticleBPSolverGraph.getTemperingHalfLifeInIterations()
    Instead get ParticleBPOptions.annealingHalfLife option using AbstractOptionHolder.getOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsSolverGraph.getTemperingHalfLifeInSamples()
    Instead get GibbsOptions.annealingHalfLife option using AbstractOptionHolder.getOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsSolverGraph.getUpdatesPerSample()
    This method will be removed in a future release.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.events.DimpleEventListener.isDefault()
    As of release 0.07 the default listener is no longer used and will be removed in a future release.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.model.domains.DiscreteDomain.isElementOf(Object)
    Use DiscreteDomain.inDomain(java.lang.Object) instead.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsSolverGraph.isTemperingEnabled()
    Instead get GibbsOptions.enableAnnealing option using AbstractOptionHolder.getOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.particleBP.ParticleBPSolverGraph.isTemperingEnabled()
    Instead get ParticleBPOptions.enableAnnealing option using AbstractOptionHolder.getOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsDiscrete.saveAllSamples()
    Instead set GibbsOptions.saveAllSamples to true using LocalOptionHolder.setOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>, T).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsReal.saveAllSamples()
    Instead set GibbsOptions.saveAllSamples to true using LocalOptionHolder.setOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>, T).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsRealJoint.saveAllSamples()

    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsSolverGraph.saveAllScores()
    Instead set GibbsOptions.saveAllScores to true using LocalOptionHolder.setOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>, T).

    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsSolverGraph.setBurnInScans(int)
    Instead set GibbsOptions.burnInScans option on this object or its corresponding model graph using LocalOptionHolder.setOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>, T).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsSolverGraph.setBurnInUpdates(int)
    This method will be removed in a future release.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.core.proposalKernels.CircularNormalProposalKernel.setCircularBounds(double, double)
    Will be removed in future release. Instead set CircularNormalProposalKernel.lowerBound and CircularNormalProposalKernel.upperBound options on variables or graphs that will be using this proposal kernel.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.minsum.MinSumDiscrete.setDamping(int, double)
    Use BPOptions.damping or BPOptions.nodeSpecificDamping options instead.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.minsum.MinSumTableFactor.setDamping(int, double)
    Use BPOptions.damping or BPOptions.nodeSpecificDamping options instead.

    com.analog.lyric.dimple.events.DimpleEventListener.setDefault(DimpleEventListener)
    As of release 0.07 the default listener is no longer used and will be removed in a future release.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsDiscrete.setDefaultSampler(String)
    Will be removed in future release. Instead use GibbsOptions.discreteSampler option.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsReal.setDefaultSampler(String)
    Will be removed in future release. Instead use GibbsOptions.realSampler option.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsRealJoint.setDefaultSampler(String)
    Will be removed in future release. Instead use GibbsOptions.realSampler option.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.model.core.FactorGraph.setEventListener(DimpleEventListener)
    As of release 0.07, this functionality has been moved to DimpleEnvironment.setEventListener(com.analog.lyric.dimple.events.DimpleEventListener).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.samplers.generic.SliceSampler.setInitialSliceWidth(double)
    Will be removed in future release. Instead set SliceSampler.initialSliceWidth option on variables or graphs that will be using this sampler.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsSolverGraph.setInitialTemperature(double)
    Instead set GibbsOptions.initialTemperature option using LocalOptionHolder.setOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>, T).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.particleBP.ParticleBPSolverGraph.setInitialTemperature(double)
    Instead set ParticleBPOptions.initialTemperature option using LocalOptionHolder.setOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>, T).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.samplers.generic.SliceSampler.setMaximumDoublings(double)
    Will be removed in future release. Instead set SliceSampler.maximumDoublings option on variables or graphs that will be using this sampler.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsSolverGraph.setNumRestarts(int)
    Instead set GibbsOptions.numRandomRestarts option on this object or its corresponding model graph using LocalOptionHolder.setOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>, T).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsSolverGraph.setNumSamples(int)
    Instead set GibbsOptions.numSamples option on this object or its corresponding model object using LocalOptionHolder.setOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>, T).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.core.proposalKernels.CircularNormalProposalKernel.setParameters(Object...)
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.core.proposalKernels.IProposalKernel.setParameters(Object...)
    Will be removed in future release. Instead set options on corresponding option holder (e.g. the variable or the graph).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.core.proposalKernels.NormalProposalKernel.setParameters(Object...)
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsReal.setProposalKernel(IProposalKernel)
    Will be removed in future release. Instead set corresponding option for sampler (e.g. MHSampler.realProposalKernel).

    Will be removed in future release. Instead set appropriate options for proposal kernel using LocalOptionHolder.setOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>, T).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsRealJoint.setProposalKernelParameters(Object...)
    Will be removed in future release. Instead set appropriate options for proposal kernel using LocalOptionHolder.setOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>, T).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.particleBP.ParticleBPReal.setProposalKernelParameters(Object...)
    instead set appropriate proposal-specific options using LocalOptionHolder.setOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>, T).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsReal.setProposalStandardDeviation(double)
    Will be removed in future release. Instead set corresponding option for desired proposal kernel (e.g. NormalProposalKernel.standardDeviation.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsRealJoint.setProposalStandardDeviation(double)
    Will be removed in future release. Instead set corresponding option for desired proposal kernel (e.g. NormalProposalKernel.standardDeviation.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.particleBP.ParticleBPReal.setProposalStandardDeviation(double)
    instead set NormalProposalKernel.standardDeviation option using LocalOptionHolder.setOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>, T) method.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.sumproduct.SumProductSolverGraph.setSampledFactorBurnInScansPerUpdate(int)
    Will be removed in a future release. Instead set GibbsOptions.burnInScans on this object using LocalOptionHolder.setOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>, T).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.sumproduct.SumProductSolverGraph.setSampledFactorSamplesPerUpdate(int)
    Will be removed in a future release. Instead set GibbsOptions.numSamples on this object using LocalOptionHolder.setOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>, T).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.sumproduct.SumProductSolverGraph.setSampledFactorScansPerSample(int)
    Will be removed in a future release. Instead set GibbsOptions.scansPerSample on this object using LocalOptionHolder.setOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>, T).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsDiscrete.setSampler(String)
    Will be removed in future release. Instead set sampler by setting GibbsOptions.discreteSampler option using LocalOptionHolder.setOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>, T).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsReal.setSampler(String)
    Will be removed in future release. Instead set sampler by setting GibbsOptions.realSampler option using LocalOptionHolder.setOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>, T).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsRealJoint.setSampler(String)
    Will be removed in future release. Instead set sampler by setting GibbsOptions.realSampler option using LocalOptionHolder.setOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>, T).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsSolverGraph.setScansPerSample(int)
    Instead set GibbsOptions.scansPerSample option on this object or its corresponding model graph using LocalOptionHolder.setOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>, T).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.core.proposalKernels.NormalProposalKernel.setStandardDeviation(double)
    Will be removed in future release. Instead set NormalProposalKernel.standardDeviation option on variables or graphs that will be using this proposal kernel.
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsSolverGraph.setTempering(boolean)
    Instead set GibbsOptions.enableAnnealing option using LocalOptionHolder.setOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>, T).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.particleBP.ParticleBPSolverGraph.setTempering(boolean)
    Instead set ParticleBPOptions.enableAnnealing option using LocalOptionHolder.setOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>, T).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.particleBP.ParticleBPSolverGraph.setTemperingHalfLifeInIterations(double)
    Instead set ParticleBPOptions.annealingHalfLife option using LocalOptionHolder.setOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>, T).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsSolverGraph.setTemperingHalfLifeInSamples(double)
    Instead set GibbsOptions.annealingHalfLife option using LocalOptionHolder.setOption(com.analog.lyric.options.IOptionKey<T>, T).
    com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.GibbsSolverGraph.setUpdatesPerSample(int)
    This method will be removed in a future release.
